Interface Movable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChargedIdentityDisc, IdentityDisc, Player

    public interface Movable

    • Method Detail

      • move

        void move(Square square)
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Moves the movable to the given square. Moving can involve getting affected by the square there is been moved on.
        Parameters:
        square - The square to move to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(Square square)
        Sets the current position of the movable.
        Parameters:
        square - The square to set the position of this movable to.

      • resetPosition

        void resetPosition(Square square)

        Returns the current position of the movable.

        The position of this movable.

      • getRange

        int getRange()
        Returns the range of the movable object.
        Returns:
        The range of this Movable.

      • resetRange

        void resetRange()
        Resets the range of the movable object to it's original range.
